name: Code Bakery
description: E-commerce web application, the application was made so that the user had a comfortable experience(including responsive) and that he could purchase products quickly, it allows to pay with two payment methods (mercadopago and stripe) and perform authentication in two steps 2FA. On the administrator's side, it has a comfortable experience allowing you to carry out promotions manually and manage users and products. The application is built with the PERNG technology stack (Postgresql, Express, React, Node and Graphql).

name: Countries App
description: Website to show information about countries, allows us to create activities to carry out during our possible visit to them. This is a simple page application(SPA), in which an api is consumed to build the database. This is made with the PERN technology stack (Postgresql, Express, React and Node).
